thread.section_title: Intrepid Travel Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Intrepid Travel | www.intrepidtravel.com
thread.title: Gary Grant
thread.title_full: Intrepid Travel reviewed by Gary Grant

author: Gary Grant
title: Gary Grant
text: I was happy with everything about this trip. IF you do your research. The accommodation, itinerary, guides and locations are exactly what they tell you. Don't expect all the fancy frills, but be prepared for a fun, amazing trip with lots to see and do. These trips are all the better for you if you know what it is you are booking. I felt safe, had fun and seen lots during my trips.
